title: feat: Add GitHub Copilot instructions
description:
## Summary

Adds comprehensive GitHub Copilot instructions for the TdsLib repository, a C# implementation of the TDS protocol.

## Changes

- Added project overview and documentation links
- Documented tech stack (.NET Standard 2.0, xUnit, Moq)
- Detailed repository structure with architectural layers table
- Added coding guidelines covering naming conventions, file naming, code style, and async patterns
- Documented error handling patterns and how to implement new tokens/payloads
- Added testing requirements with xUnit conventions and example commands
- Included build and development instructions
- Added best practices section with always/never guidelines
- Specified conventional commit message format
